## Administration

#### Purpose
Consume the Census ACS data for commute mode share by residence location for various geographies and create the flat files needed by Vital Signs.

## Overhead

#### Libraries
```{r overhead}
library(knitr)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
library(RCurl)
```

#### Knitr config
```{r config, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache=TRUE)
```

#### Parameters
```{r parameters}
#key = ""

```

#### API Calls
```{r api-calls}
DEMO_CALL = paste("http://api.census.gov/data/2013/acs1/profile?get=NAME,DP02_0001E&for=county:*&in=state:06&key=", key, sep = "")
COUNTY_CALL = paste("http://api.census.gov/data/2013/acs1/concept?get=NAME,B08101_44E&in:0500000US06001&key=", 
                    key,  sep = "")

```


#### Consume data via Census API via acs package
```{r data-consume}
TEST <- read.csv(textConnection(getURL(COUNTY_CALL)))
TEST
```
